body.name: Digital Point and Shoot Camera, Compact Digital Camera with 2.88' IPS Screen 48MP 4K for Photo and Video, Small Digital Camera Support 16X Zoom Macro Mode and Flash, Beginner Camera for Teens
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 2 hrs 57 mins
features: 📸Digital Camera 48MP: This digital point and shoot camera adopts advanced CMOS sensor, allow for capturing 4K videos and 48MP photos without complex settings, record daily highlights. Features macro mode and 2.88-inch IPS color screen, enable clear shooting of flowers, plants, or small insects, and more at 4 inch-5 inch, suitable for beginners and children. Note: when adjusted to macro mode, there is a flower icon on the screen.

📸HD 4K Digital Camera Anti-Shake: Hiacinto point and shoot digital camera has video pause function, simply press the "OK button" to pause while recording video. It also support flash for night photo and video shooting, ISO fill light, white balance optional for different occasion, anti shake, 3 burst, beauty mode, plus 20 creative filters, face detection, selfie, built-in microphone and speaker. Easy to use, quite good optional for children's first digital camera to record life moments.

📸16X Digital Zoom & Webcam: Hiacinto point and shoot camera supports 16x digital zoom, press the W/T button to zoom in or out still images. It can also serve as a webcam, after power off, connect it to the computer via usb cable, press the shutter and power buttons at same time, and it will enter webcam mode for video calls/live streaming.

📸Compact Digital Camera & Easy to Use: This small camera weighs less than 0.5lb, size at 3.9*0.8*2.1 inch, metal anti slip touch, right fit for teens and kids hand. With this portable digital camera, it will significantly help reduce teens and kids electronic product addiction, and record happy moments in life. Thanks to its beginner friendly operation, even kids can learn how to shoot decent photos in a day!

📸A Perfect Gift & Warranty: This budget digital camera support time stamp, good for keeping record of happy life events. It is easy to use and stylish, pop into trending gift choice for kids teens, senoirs to take beautiful photos. Besides, we provide Free replacement within 30 days and free refund. Your satisfaction is our top priority. If you have any questions, please let us know via your order, we will reply within 12 hours.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Kids Point and Shoot Camera for Photography This 48MP digital camera has extremely high cost-efficiency with retro appearance, equipped with IPS 2.88 Inch LCD screen, FHD 4K video resolution, 48 megapixels and portable design, helping you capture and record the most exciting memorable moments with high-quality images or videos.With macro mode and 16X sigital zoom,allowing you to press the W/T button to zoom in or out on the subject while recording videos and still images. Equipped with anti-shake, face recognition, smile detection, continuous shooting, self-timer,fill light and flexible capturing the shooting subject.Recording the shooting time,so that you can look it back, you can also choose that the date stamp is on or off. Note: Not for 2-5 years kids, we designed this 4K digital camera for 6-18 years school children,beginners & amateurs, not Professional users.

DIGITAL CAMERA 48MP 48MP digital camera adopts CMOS image sensor and IPS true color screen to capture clear and vivid photos. FHD 4K VIDEO This point and shoot camera also has a pause function, you can pause while recording or playing video by pressing the "OK button". The built-in fill light can help you take high-quality photos in the dark. 16X DIGITAL ZOOM Vintage digital camera for kids supports 16x digital zoom, You can zoom in or zoom out the subject by pressing the W/T button while recording video and taking still images.

EASY TO CARRY Smaller than cell phones, portable camera is small enough to fit your pocket, easy to carry at anywhere. FACE AND SMILE DETECTION This small compact camera was equipped with anti-shake, face recognition, smile detection, continuous shooting, self-timer, and flexible capturing the shooting subject. LIVE STREMING This digital point and shoot camera also can be used as a webcam, just turn off the camera, connect it with the computer, press shutter and power button at the same time, then it will on the webcam mode for video calling/ living streaming and so on.

Product Description: Video Resolution: 4K 3840 x2160@10fps,2.7K 2688x1520@ 20fps, FHD1920x1080 @30FPS,1280x720P@30FPS Picture Resolution: 48M; 30M; 24M; 20M;16M; 12M;10M;8M;5M; Zoom: 16x digital zoom File format: JPEG (Still Image)/AVI (Video) White Balance: Automatic, Daylight, cloudy, Incandescent, fluorescent External Memory: SD Card (up to 128GB,>=CLASS10) Radio Record: Build-in microphone Lens: F3.0 f=7.45 Exposure compensation: -3.0EV ~ +3.0EV PC Interface: Type-C

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great camera , no issues
reviews.reviewText: Bought this one as a replacement for our old one that broke . It’s easy to use , good picture quality , and relatively cheap . Good camera especially for the price point

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Camera for young photographers
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased this digital camera for my 10-year-old daughter, and it’s been an absolute hit! We’re gearing up for a trip to Europe, and I wanted her to have something special for capturing memories - something more tangible and focused than a regular device.This camera has been a fantastic choice. It’s lightweight, making it easy for her to carry around all day without any complaints. The picture quality is impressive; the images are clear, vibrant, and capture our moments beautifully. Additionally, the price point was spot on - it offers great value without breaking the bank.I highly recommend this camera to anyone looking for a child-friendly, quality camera that won’t weigh down your adventures. It’s a great way to encourage young ones to explore the world through a lens!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality, easy to use, perfect size
reviews.reviewText: Digital cameras have become popular again with teenagers thanks to Tik Tok and this one is perfect for them. It’s small enough for them to carry, easy for them to use, but delivers great quality photos! I would recommend this as a great buy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Camera, Unbelievable Price!
reviews.reviewText: I got this camera for my 14 yr old son to use in photography club. When it came, it reminded me of the cameras we all used to carry around before our cell phones took pictures...but better. It wasn't flimsy, it had a large display, the mps were impressive and it had settings. My son has now been using it a couple months and LOVES it. He adjusts the settings, uses the preview screen, he edits, the battery holds up and the thing hasn't broke yet (which says a lot because 14 yr old boys are about as delicate as a rhinoceros.) Would definitely buy again! I was even thinking about ordering my 65 yr old mom one for Christmas since it was so easy to use and the display was so large. Definitely a good value and suitable for all ages!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been using this product and I really enjoy it and it’s very easy and simple to use and I would recommend this camera for anyone who is interested.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great beginner’s camera
reviews.reviewText: Purchased this for a 17 year old and it is easy to use and understand. Takes great photos and easy to download to the computer. Would purchase again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Straightforward to use, takes great quality photos, and easy to download to my laptop. Would recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Photo download to PC
reviews.reviewText: Used this camera on a recent ocean cruise. Very easy to use. Picture quality is questionable. After following instructions (several times) to download images to computer, I have given up. Computer does not recognize the camera resulting in unsuccessful download. Needless to say, I am very disappointed in this product.
